attributes.action: pledge not to increase the future tax burden on motorists driving cars built in 2006 or earlier by more than the rate of inflation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We further urge the Prime Minister to recognise that whilst technological developments will continue to reduce the CO2 emissions from new cars, when the emissions created in providing the energy required to produce these new cars is taken into account, continuing to run a properly maintained existing car is more eco-friendly than the scrapping of an older car and the purchase of a new one.
